name: Cinder-videostream
tagline: CInder block for video streaming. Server and Client threaded applications using asio framework and jpg frame compression.
body:
### Welcome to Cinder-VideoStream.
This Cinder block allows creating videostream server and client applications using asio framework in libcinder creative toolkit

### How to use it
Download this project as a zip, or clone if from the github and place into Cinder Blocks directory. Launch Cinder's TinderBox app and, while creating your streaming application, select this block from the list of available Cinder blocks. A minimal application will be created automatically. Open created c++ project and start customizing it. That's it!

### Creating pages manually
Currently, this block is based on Cinder 0.9 release (glNext branch previously)

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
